mobileResponsivenessTip: Consider optimizing images and content scaling to improve mobile responsiveness.
loadingSpeedTip: Reduce the size of large images and implement lazy loading for faster page load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Add more relevant meta tags, improve keyword usage, and ensure all pages are properly indexed.
userExperienceTip: Simplify navigation and make call-to-action buttons more prominent for a better user experience.
bookingFlowTip: Make the booking process smoother by reducing the number of steps and adding clearer instructions.
